mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY
INSERT INTO tb_alo_resource ( sid, app_code, scode, menu_name, menu_decr, menu_type, menu_url, menu_sort, menu_grade, del_flag, parent_sid, parent_code, split_db_key, create_dt, create_by, update_dt, update_by, versionn) values( #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuDecr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitDbKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_alo_resource
app_code = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scode = #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_decr = #{menuDecr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_sort = #{menuSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_grade = #{menuGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_sid = #{parentSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
split_db_key = #{splitDbKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_dt = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_dt = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
versionn = #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT sid, app_code, scode, menu_name, menu_decr, menu_type, menu_url, menu_sort, menu_grade, del_flag, parent_sid, parent_code, split_db_key, create_dt, create_by, update_dt, update_by, versionn FROM tb_alo_resource
